然而，为了避免我们太快否定这个比喻，我们应该注意通过专业化发展起来的系统会获得同样的 盒中盒结构（例如，由口腔、喉部、食道、胃、小肠和大肠、结肠组成的消化系统；或由心脏、动脉、静脉和毛细血管组成的循环系统）是由更简单的系统组装而成的。本章的下一个主要部分将讨论几乎可分解的系统。它提出，不是组件本身的组装，而是通过组装或专业化产生的层次结构，为快速进化提供了潜力。

Lest we dismiss the metaphor too quickly, however, we should observe that systems that evolve through specialization acquire the same kind of boxes-within-boxes structure (e.g., a digestive system consisting of mouth, larynx, esophagus, stomach, small and large intestines, colon; or a circulatory system consisting of a heart, arteries, veins, and capillaries) as is acquired by systems that evolve by assembly of simpler systems. The next main section of this chapter deals with nearly decomposable systems. It proposes that it is not assembly from components, per se, but hierarchic structure produced either by assembly or specialization, that provides the potential for rapid evolution.

7. 请参阅 Linschitz 的《信息内容》。该量 10"" 卡/度，相当于约 10" 位信息。

7. See Linschitz, "The Information Content." This quantity, 10"" cal/degree, corresponds to about 10" bits of information.

8. 参阅H. Kacser，《生物组织的一些物理化学方面》，附录，第191-249页，收录于CH Waddington所著《基因策略》（伦敦：George Allen and Unwin，1957年）。

8. See H. Kacser, "Some Physico-chemical Aspects of Biological Organization," appendix, pp. 191-249, in C. H. Waddington, The Strategy of the Genes (London: George Allen and Unwin, 1957).

有人声称，任何由一组稳定的子系统组成的复杂系统都具有快速进化的潜力，每个子系统几乎独立于其他子系统内正在进行的详细过程运行，因此主要受其他子系统的净输入和输出的影响。如果满足近可分解性条件，则一个组件的效率（因此其对生物体适应性的贡献）不依赖于其他组件的详细结构。

The claim is that the potential for rapid evolution exists in any complex system that consists of a set of stable subsystems, each operating nearly independently of the detailed processes going on within the other subsystems, hence influenced mainly by the net inputs and outputs of the other subsystems. If the near-decomposability condition is met, the efficiency of one component (hence its contribution to the organism's fitness) does not depend on the detailed structure of other components.

然而，在详细研究这一说法之前，我想简单讨论一下钟表匠比喻的一些非生物学应用，以说明等级制度在其他情况下享有的重要优势。

Before examining this claim in detail, however, I should like to discuss briefly some non-biological applications of the watchmaker metaphor to illustrate the important advantages that hierarchic systems enjoy in other circumstances.

解决问题是自然选择

Problem Solving as Natural Selection

层次结构以及类似于自然选择的过程出现在人类解决问题的过程中，而这一领域与生物进化没有明显的联系。例如，考虑发现一个困难定理的证明的任务。这个过程可以（并且经常被描述为）在迷宫中搜索。从公理和先前证明的定理开始，尝试数学系统规则允许的各种变换，以获得新的表达式。这些表达式被依次修改，直到凭借坚持不懈和好运，发现一个导致目标的变换序列或路径。

Hierarchy, as well as processes akin to natural selection, appear in human problem solving, a domain that has no obvious connection with biological evolution. Consider, for example, the task of discovering the proof for a difficult theorem. The process can be—and often has been—described as a search through a maze. Starting with the axioms and previously proved theorems, various transformations allowed by the rules of the mathematical systems are attempted, to obtain new expressions. These are modified in turn until, with persistence and good fortune, a sequence or path of transformations is discovered that leads to the goal.

这个过程通常需要大量的反复试验。尝试各种路径；有些路径被放弃，有些路径被进一步推进。在找到解决方案之前，可能会探索迷宫的许多路径。问题越困难、越新颖，找到解决方案所需的反复试验量就越大。同时，反复试验并不是完全随机或盲目的；事实上，它相当具有选择性。 通过转换给定的表达式而得到的新表达式被检查，看它们是否代表朝着目标的进展。有进展的迹象会促使人们在同一方向上进一步探索；没有进展则意味着放弃探索。解决问题需要有选择的反复试验。9

The process ordinarily involves much trial and error. Various paths are tried; some are abandoned, others are pushed further. Before a solution is found, many paths of the maze may be explored. The more difficult and novel the problem, the greater is likely to be the amount of trial and error required to find a solution. At the same time the trial and error is not completely random or blind; it is in fact rather highly selective. The new expressions that are obtained by transforming given ones are examined to see whether they represent progress toward the goal. Indications of progress spur further search in the same direction; lack of progress signals the abandonment of a line of search. Problem solving requires selective trial and error.9

稍加思考就会发现，在解决问题的过程中，信号进展的线索所起的作用与生物进化过程中稳定的中间形式所起的作用相同。事实上，我们可以借鉴钟表匠的寓言，并将其应用于解决问题。在解决问题的过程中，代表可识别的朝着目标前进的进展的部分结果起着稳定子组件的作用。

A little reflection reveals that cues signaling progress play the same role in the problem-solving process that stable intermediate forms play in the biological evolutionary process. In fact we can take over the watchmaker parable and apply it also to problem solving. In problem solving, a partial result that represents recognizable progress toward the goal plays the role of stable subassembly.

假设任务是打开一个保险箱，保险箱的锁上有 10 个拨盘，每个拨盘有 100 个可能的设置，编号从 0 到 99。通过盲目试错法寻找正确的设置，需要多长时间才能打开保险箱？由于有 100 10 个可能的设置，我们可能平均要检查其中的一半，才能找到正确的设置——也就是 500 亿亿个设置。然而，假设保险箱有缺陷，当任何一个拨盘转到正确设置时都会听到咔嗒声。现在每个拨盘都可以独立调整，在设置其他拨盘时不需要再次触摸。需要尝试的设置总数只有 10 X 50，即 500。通过咔嗒声提供的提示，打开保险箱的任务从几乎不可能的任务变成了微不足道的任务。10

Suppose that the task is to open a safe whose lock has 10 dials, each with 100 possible settings, numbered from 0 to 99. How long will it take to open the safe by a blind trial-and-error search for the correct setting? Since there are 10010 possible settings, we may expect to examine about one half of these, on the average, before finding the correct one—that is, 50 billion billion settings. Suppose, however, that the safe is defective, so that a click can be heard when any one dial is turned to the correct setting. Now each dial can be adjusted independently and does not need to be touched again while the others are being set. The total number of settings that have to be tried is only 10 X 50, or 500. The task of opening the safe has been altered, by the cues the clicks provide, from a practically impossible one to a trivial one.10

9. 参见 A. Newell、JC Shaw 和 HA Simon 的《逻辑理论机的实证探索》，1957 年西部联合计算机会议论文集，1957年2月（纽约：无线电工程师协会）；《下棋程序和复杂性问题》，IBM研究与开发杂志，第 2 期（1958 年 10 月）：320-335；有关解决问题的类似观点，参见 WR Ashby 的《智能放大器的设计》 ，载于 CE Shannon 和 J. McCarthy 的《自动机研究》（普林斯顿：普林斯顿大学出版社，1956 年）第 215-233 页。

9. See A. Newell, J. C. Shaw, and H. A. Simon, "Empirical 'Explorations of the Logic Theory Machine," Proceedings of the 1957 Western Joint Computer Conference, February 1957 (New York: Institute of Radio Engineers); "Chess-Playing Programs and the Problem of Complexity," IBM Journal of Research and Development, 2(October 1958):320-335; and for a similar view of problem solving, W. R. Ashby, "Design for an Intelligence Amplifier," pp. 215-233 in C. E. Shannon and J. McCarthy, Automata Studies (Princeton: Princeton University Press, 1956).

10. 保险柜咔嗒作响的例子由 DP Simon 提供。Ashby 在《智能放大器设计》第 230 页中将此类情况下的选择性称为“组件选择”。与钟表匠的比喻相比，保险柜咔嗒作响的例子中，层次化带来的时间减少甚至更大，这是因为前者涉及随机搜索正确的组合，而后者则涉及按正确顺序组合的部件。目前尚不清楚哪种比喻为生物进化提供了更好的模型，但我们可以肯定，钟表匠的比喻 隐喻对层次化带来的节约给出了极为保守的估计。保险箱可能给出过高的估计，因为它假设所有可能的元素排列都是同样可能的。有关钟表匠和点击保险箱论证在分子水平上的结构应用的变体，请参阅 JD Watson，《基因的分子生物学》，第 3 版（加利福尼亚州门洛帕克：WA Benjamin，1976 年），第 107-108 页。

10. The clicking safe example was supplied by D. P. Simon. Ashby, "Design for an Intelligence Amplifier," p. 230, has called the selectivity involved in situations of this kind "selection by components." The even greater reduction in time produced by hierarchization in the clicking safe example, as compared with the watchmaker's metaphor, is due to the fact that a random search for the correct combination is involved in the former case, while in the latter the parts come together in the right order. It is not clear which of these metaphors provides the better model for biological evolution, but we may be sure that the watchmaker's metaphor gives an exceedingly conservative estimate of the savings due to hierarchization. The safe may give an excessively high estimate because it assumes all possible arrangements of the elements to be equally probable. For an application of a variant of the watchmaker and the clicking safe arguments to structure at the molecular level, see J. D. Watson, Molecular Biology of the Gene, 3rd ed. (Menlo Park, CA: W. A. Benjamin, 1976), pp. 107-108.

过去三十年来，人们对代表人类常见问题解决任务的迷宫的性质有了相当多的了解，例如证明定理、解决难题、下棋、投资、平衡装配线等等。我们对这些迷宫的所有了解都指向同一个结论：人类解决问题，从最笨拙到最有洞察力，无非是反复试验和选择性的不同组合。选择性来自各种经验法则或启发式方法，它们表明哪些路径应该首先尝试，哪些路径有希望。我们不需要假设比有机进化更复杂的过程来解释如何将巨大的问题迷宫缩小到相当合理的大小（另见第 3 章和第 4 章）。”

A considerable amount has been learned in the past thirty years about the nature of the mazes that represent common human problem-solving tasks—proving theorems, solving puzzles, playing chess, making investments, balancing assembly lines, to mention a few. All that we have learned about these mazes points to the same conclusion: that human problem solving, from the most blundering to the most insightful, involves nothing more than varying mixtures of trial and error and selectivity. The selectivity derives from various rules of thumb, or heuristics, that suggest which paths should be tried first and which leads are promising. We do not need to postulate processes more sophisticated than those involved in organic evolution to explain how enormous problem mazes are cut down to quite reasonable size (see also chapters 3 and 4)."

选择性的来源

The Sources of Selectivity

当我们检查问题解决系统或不断发展的系统（视情况而定）的选择性来源时，我们发现选择性总是可以等同于来自环境的某种信息反馈。

When we examine the sources from which the problem-solving system, or the evolving system, as the case may be, derives its selectivity, we discover that selectivity can always be equated with some kind of feedback of information from the environment.

让我们首先考虑解决问题的情况。有两种基本的选择性。一种我们已经提到过：尝试各种路径，记录遵循这些路径的后果，并利用这些信息指导进一步的搜索。同样，在有机进化中，各种复合体至少是短暂的，而那些稳定的复合体为进一步的构建提供了新的构建块。正是这种关于稳定配置的信息，而不是来自太阳的自由能或负熵，指导了进化过程并提供了解释其快速性所必需的选择性。

Let us consider the case of problem solving first. There are two basic kinds of selectivity. One we have already noted: various paths are tried out, the consequences of following them are noted, and this information is used to guide further search. In the same way in organic evolution various complexes come into being, at least evanescently, and those that are stable provide new building blocks for further construction. It is this information about stable configurations, and not free energy or negentropy from the sun, that guides the process of evolution and provides the selectivity that is essential to account for its rapidity.

解决问题时选择性的第二个来源是以前的经验。当要解决的问题是 类似于之前已经解决的问题。然后，只需再次尝试路径导致了早期解决方案或其类似物，反复试验搜索被大大减少或完全消除。

The second source of selectivity in problem solving is previous experience. We see this particularly clearly when the problem to be solved is similar to one that has been solved before. Then, by simply trying again the paths that led to the earlier solution, or their analogues, trial-and-error search is greatly reduced or altogether eliminated.

11. A. Newell 和 HA Simon，《人类思维的计算机模拟》，《科学》， 134（1961 年 12 月 22 日）：2011-2017。

11. A. Newell and H. A. Simon, "Computer Simulation of Human Thinking," Science, 134(December 22, 1961):2011-2017.

在有机进化中，后一种信息对应的是什么？最接近的类似物是繁殖。一旦我们达到自我繁殖系统的水平，一个复杂的系统一旦实现，就可以无限地繁殖。事实上，繁殖允许获得性特征的遗传，但当然是在遗传物质的水平上；也就是说，只有基因获得的特征才能被遗传。我们将在本文的最后一部分回到繁殖这个话题。

What corresponds to this latter kind of information in organic evolution? The closest analogue is reproduction. Once we reach the level of self-reproducing systems, a complex system, when it has once been achieved, can be multiplied indefinitely. Reproduction in fact allows the inheritance of acquired characteristics, but at the level of genetic material, of course; that is, only characteristics acquired by the genes can be inherited. We shall return to the topic of reproduction in the final section of this essay.

论帝国与帝国建设

On Empires and Empire Building

我们还没有穷尽钟表匠论证可以合理应用的复杂系统类别。菲利普组建了他的马其顿帝国并将其传给了他的儿子，后来又将其与波斯分支和其他分支合并为亚历山大的大系统。亚历山大死后，他的帝国并没有化为尘土，而是分裂成组成它的一些主要子系统。

We have not exhausted the categories of complex systems to which the watchmaker argument can reasonably be applied. Philip assembled his Macedonian empire and gave it to his son, to be later combined with the Persian subassembly and others into Alexander's greater system. On Alexander's death his empire did not crumble to dust but fragmented into some of the major subsystems that had composed it.

钟表匠的论点意味着，如果一个人想成为亚历山大，那么他应该出生在一个已经存在大型稳定政治体系的世界。在不满足这一条件的地方，比如在西徐亚和印度边境，亚历山大发现建立帝国是一件棘手的事情。同样，TE 劳伦斯组织阿拉伯人反抗土耳其人的起义也受到他最大的稳定基石——独立、可疑的沙漠部落——特征的限制。

The watchmaker argument implies that if one would be Alexander, one should be born into a world where large stable political systems already exist. Where this condition was not fulfilled, as on the Scythian and Indian frontiers, Alexander found empire building a slippery business. So too, T. E. Lawrence's organizing of the Arabian revolt against the Turks was limited by the character of his largest stable building blocks, the separate, suspicious desert tribes.

历史学专业更看重经过验证的具体事实，而不是有倾向性的概括。因此，我不会详细阐述我的想法，而是让历史学家来决定是否可以从分层复杂系统的抽象理论中学到任何解释历史的东西。

The profession of history places a greater value upon the validated particular fact than upon tendentious generalization. I shall not elaborate upon my fancy therefore but shall leave it to historians to decide whether anything can be learned for the interpretation of history from an abstract theory of hierarchic complex systems.

结论：等级制度的进化解释

Conclusion: The Evolutionary Explanation of Hierarchy

到目前为止，我们已经表明，如果存在稳定的中间形式，复杂系统从简单系统演化的速度将比没有中间形式时快得多。前一种情况下产生的复杂形式将是 层次结构。我们只需反过来论证，就能解释自然界呈现给我们的复杂系统中层次结构占主导地位的原因。在可能的复杂形式中，层次结构是那些有时间演化的形式。复杂性将是层次结构的假设并没有区分非常平坦的层次结构，如晶体、组织和聚合物，以及中间形式。事实上，在我们在自然界遇到的复杂系统中，两种形式的例子都很突出。比我们在这里开发的理论更完整的理论可能会对这些系统中跨度宽度的决定因素有所说明。

We have shown thus far that complex systems will evolve from simple systems much more rapidly if there are stable intermediate forms than if there are not. The resulting complex forms in the former case will be hierarchic. We have only to turn the argument around to explain the observed predominance of hierarchies among the complex systems nature presents to us. Among possible complex forms, hierarchies are the ones that have the time to evolve. The hypothesis that complexity will be hierarchic makes no distinction among very flat hierarchies, like crystals and tissues and polymers, and the intermediate forms. Indeed in the complex systems we encounter in nature examples of both forms are prominent. A more complete theory than the one we have developed here would presumably have something to say about the determinants of width of span in these systems.

近乎可分解的系统

Nearly Decomposable Systems

在层级系统中，我们可以区分子系统之间的相互作用和子系统内部（即子系统各部分之间的相互作用）。不同层次的相互作用可能具有不同的数量级，而且通常也是如此。在正式组织中，平均而言，同一部门的两名员工之间的相互作用通常比不同部门的两名员工之间的相互作用要多。在有机物质中，分子间力通常弱于分子力，分子力弱于核力。

In hierarchic systems we can distinguish between the interactions among subsystems, on the one hand, and the interactions within subsystems— that is, among the parts of those subsystems—on the other. The interactions at the different levels may be, and often will be, of different orders of magnitude. In a formal organization there will generally be more interaction, on the average, between two employees who are members of the same department than between two employees from different departments. In organic substances intermolecular forces will generally be weaker than molecular forces, and molecular forces weaker than nuclear forces.

在稀有气体中，分子间的力与分子间的力相比可以忽略不计——我们可以将单个粒子视为彼此独立的粒子，用于许多目的。我们可以将这样的系统描述为可分解为由单个粒子组成的子系统。随着气体密度的增加，分子间的相互作用变得更加显著。但在某种范围内，我们可以将可分解的情况视为极限和第一近似值。例如，我们可以使用完美气体理论来近似描述实际气体（如果它们密度不是太大）的行为。作为第二近似值，我们可以转向几乎可分解系统的理论，其中子系统之间的相互作用较弱但不可忽略。

In a rare gas the intermolecular forces will be negligible compared to those binding the molecules—we can treat the individual particles for many purposes as if they were independent of each other. We can describe such a system as decomposable into the subsystems comprised of the individual particles. As the gas becomes denser, molecular interactions become more significant. But over some range we can treat the decomposable case as a limit and as a first approximation. We can use a theory of perfect gases, for example, to describe approximately the behavior of actual gases if they are not too dense. As a second approximation we may move to a theory of nearly decomposable systems, in which the interactions among the subsystems are weak but not negligible.

至少有些类型的层次系统可以成功地近似为近可分解系统。 该方法可以归纳为两个命题：（1）在近似可分解的系统中，每个组成子系统的短期行为大致独立于其他组成部分的短期行为；（2）从长期来看，任何一个组成部分的行为都只在总体上取决于其他组成部分的行为。

At least some kinds of hierarchic systems can be approximated successfully as nearly decomposable systems. The main theoretical findings from the approach can be summed up in two propositions: (1) in a nearly decomposable system the short-run behavior of each of the component subsystems is approximately independent of the short-run behavior of the other components; (2) in the long run the behavior of any one of the components depends in only an aggregate way on the behavior of the other components.

让我提供一个非常具体、简单的近乎可分解系统的例子。12考虑一栋建筑，其外墙与环境完美隔热。我们将这些墙作为我们系统的边界。该建筑被分成许多房间，房间之间的墙是良好但不是完美的隔热材料。房间之间的墙是我们主要子系统的边界。每个房间被隔板分成许多小隔间，但隔板的隔热性能很差。每个隔间都挂着一个温度计。假设在我们第一次观察系统时，隔间之间和房间之间的温度差异很大——建筑内的各个隔间处于热不平衡状态。几个小时后，当我们再次读取温度时，我们会发现什么？每个房间内隔间之间的温度变化很小，但房间之间的温度变化可能仍然很大。几天后，当我们再次读取温度时，我们发现整个建筑的温度几乎均匀；房间之间的温差几乎消失了。

Let me provide a very concrete simple example of a nearly decomposable system.12 Consider a building whose outside walls provide perfect thermal insulation from the environment. We shall take these walls as the boundary of our system. The building is divided into a large number of rooms, the walls between them being good, but not perfect, insulators. The walls between rooms are the boundaries of our major subsystems. Each room is divided by partitions into a number of cubicles, but the partitions are poor insulators. A thermometer hangs in each cubicle. Suppose that at the time of our first observation of the system there is a wide variation in temperature from cubicle to cubicle and from room to room—the various cubicles within the building are in a state of thermal disequilibrium. When we take new temperature readings several hours later, what shall we find? There will be very little variation in temperature among the cubicles within each single room, but there may still be large temperature variations among rooms. When we take readings again several days later, we find an almost uniform temperature throughout the building; the temperature differences among rooms have virtually disappeared.

我们可以通过建立通常的热流方程来正式描述平衡过程。这些方程可以用它们的系数矩阵 r, ;来表示，其中r t] 是温度每相差一度，热量从第 / 个隔间流向第 / 个隔间的速率特性。如果隔间 i 和 i 没有共用的墙壁，则r tt 将为零。如果隔间i和 / 有共用的墙壁且位于同一房间，则 r i;将很大。如果隔间 i 和 / 被房间的墙壁隔开，则r tl 将不为零但很小。因此，通过将同一房间中的所有隔间组合在一起，我们可以排列系数矩阵，使其所有大元素都位于主对角线上的一串方格子矩阵内。这些对角线方格之外的所有元素要么为零，要么很小（见图 7）。我们可以取一些小数e作为对角线外元素的上限。我们将具有这些属性的矩阵称为近可分解矩阵。

We can describe the process of equilibrium formally by setting up the usual equations of heat flow. The equations can be represented by the matrix of their coefficients, r,;, where rt] is the rate at which heat flows from the /th cubicle to the /th cubicle per degree difference in their temperatures. If cubicles / and i do not have a common wall, rtt will be zero. If cubicles i and / have a common wall and are in the same room, ri; will be large. If cubicles / and / are separated by the wall of a room, rtl will be nonzero but small. Hence, by grouping together all the cubicles that are in the same room, we can arrange the matrix of coefficients so that all its large elements lie inside a string of square submatrices along the main diagonal. All the elements outside these diagonal squares will be either zero or small (see figure 7). We may take some small number, e, as the upper bound of the extradiagonal elements. We shall call a matrix having these properties a nearly decomposable matrix.

12. 关于近可分解性的讨论基于 HA Simon 和 A. Ando 的《动态系统中的变量聚合》，《计量经济学》，29（1961 年 4 月）：第 11-138 页。示例来自同一来源，第 117-118 页。有关该理论的后续发展和应用，请参阅 PJ Courtois 的《可分解性：排队和计算机系统应用》（纽约：Academic Press，1977 年）；Y. Iwasaki 和 HA Simon 的《因果关系和模型抽象》，《人工智能》 ， 67（1994 年）：第 143-194 页；以及 DF Rogers 和 RD Plante 的《使用聚合和分解技术估计带对角马尔可夫链的均衡概率》，《运筹学中的计算机》 ， 20（1993 年）：第 857-877 页。

12. This discussion of near decomposability is based upon H. A. Simon and A. Ando, "Aggregation of Variables in Dynamic Systems," Econometrica, 29 (April 1961):! 11-138. The example is drawn from the same source, pp. 117-118. For subsequent development and applications of the theory see P. J. Courtois, Decomposability: Queueingand Computer System Applications (New York, NY: Academic Press, 1977); Y. Iwasaki and H. A. Simon, "Causality and Model Abstraction," Artificial Intelligence, 67(1994): 143-194; and D. F. Rogers and R. D. Plante, "Estimating Equilibrium Probabilities for Band Diagonal Markov Chains Using Aggregation and Disaggregation Techniques," Computers in Operations Research, 20(1993):857-877.

现在已经证明，可以用近似可分解矩阵描述的动态系统具有前面所述的近似可分解系统的特性。在我们简单的热流示例中，这意味着在短期内，每个房间将几乎独立于其他房间达到平衡温度（其办公室初始温度的平均值），并且在整个建筑物内建立整体温度平衡的较长时间内，每个房间将大致保持平衡状态。 在达到房间内短期平衡后，每个房间中单个温度计就足以描述整个系统的动态行为 - 每个隔间中单独的温度计将是多余的。

Now it has been proved that a dynamic system that can be described by a nearly decomposable matrix has the properties, stated earlier, of a nearly decomposable system. In our simple example of heat flow this means that in the short run each room will reach an equilibrium temperature (an average of the initial temperatures of its offices) nearly independently of the others and that each room will remain approximately in a state of equilibrium over the longer period during which an over-all temperature equilibrium is being established throughout the building. After the intra-room short-run equilibria have been reached, a single thermometer in each room will be adequate to describe the dynamic behavior of the entire system—separate thermometers in each cubicle will be superfluous.

社会系统的近可分解性

Near Decomposability of Social Systems

从图 7 可以看出，近似可分解性是矩阵具有的一个相当强的属性，具有此属性的矩阵将描述非常特殊的动态系统——在所有可想到的系统中，这种系统非常少见。它们的数量当然取决于我们坚持的近似值有多好。如果我们要求 epsilon 非常小，则相应地很少有动态系统符合该定义。但我们已经看到，在自然界中，近似可分解系统并不罕见。相反，每个变量与系统几乎所有其他部分以几乎相等的强度关联的系统则少得多，也不太典型。

As a glance at figure 7 shows, near decomposability is a rather strong property for a matrix to possess, and the matrices that have this property will describe very special dynamic systems—vanishingly few systems out of all those that are thinkable. How few they will be depends of course on how good an approximation we insist upon. If we demand that epsilon be very small, correspondingly few dynamic systems will fit the definition. But we have already seen that in the natural world nearly decomposable systems are far from rare. On the contrary, systems in which each variable is linked with almost equal strength with almost all other parts of the system are far rarer and less typical.

在经济动态中，主要变量是商品的价格和数量。经验表明，任何给定商品的价格及其交换率在很大程度上只取决于少数其他商品的价格和数量，以及少数其他总量，如平均价格水平或某种总体经济活动指标。较大的关联系数通常与行业内和行业间原材料和半成品的主要流动有关。经济的投入产出矩阵给出了这些流量的大小，揭示了系统几乎可分解的结构——但有一个条件。经济中有一个消费子系统，它与大多数其他子系统中的变量紧密相关。因此，我们必须稍微修改可分解性的概念，以适应消费子系统在分析经济动态行为中的特殊作用。

In economic dynamics the main variables are the prices and quantities of commodities. It is empirically true that the price of any given commodity and the rate at which it is exchanged depend to a significant extent only on the prices and quantities of a few other commodities, together with a few other aggregate magnitudes, like the average price level or some over-all measure of economic activity. The large linkage coefficients are associated in general with the main flows of raw materials and semifinished products within and between industries. An input-output matrix of the economy, giving the magnitudes of these flows, reveals the nearly decomposable structure of the system—with one qualification. There is a consumption subsystem of the economy that is linked strongly to variables in most of the other subsystems. Hence we have to modify our notions of decomposability slightly to accommodate the special role of the consumption subsystem in our analysis of the dynamic behavior of the economy.

在社会系统的动态中，系统成员与其他成员进行交流和影响，近可分解性通常非常突出。这在正式组织中最为明显，正式的权威关系将组织的每个成员与一名直接上级和少数下属联系起来。 当然，组织中的许多沟通都遵循正式权力线以外的其他渠道。但这些渠道中的大多数都从某个特定个人通向其极少数的上级、下属和同事。因此，部门边界的作用与我们热例子中的墙壁非常相似。

In the dynamics of social systems, where members of a system communicate with and influence other members, near decomposability is generally very prominent. This is most obvious in formal organizations, where the formal authority relation connects each member of the organization with one immediate superior and with a small number of subordinates. Of course many communications in organizations follow other channels than the lines of formal authority. But most of these channels lead from any particular individual to a very limited number of his superiors, subordinates, and associates. Hence departmental boundaries play very much the same role as the walls in our heat example.

物理化学系统

Physicochemical Systems

在生物化学中常见的复杂系统中，类似的结构清晰可见。以此类系统中的原子核作为系统的基本组成部分，并构建元素间键强度矩阵。矩阵元素的数量级将大不相同。最大的通常对应于共价键，其次是离子键，第三组对应于氢键，更小的键对应于范德华力。13如果我们选择一个比共价键大小略小的 epsilon，系统将分解为子系统——组成分子。较小的键将对应于分子间键。

In the complex systems familiar in biological chemistry, a similar structure is clearly visible. Take the atomic nuclei in such a system as the elementary parts of the system, and construct a matrix of bond strengths between elements. There will be matrix elements of quite different orders of magnitude. The largest will generally correspond to the covalent bonds, the next to the ionic bonds, the third group to hydrogen bonds, still smaller linkages to van der Waals forces.13 If we select an epsilon just a little smaller than the magnitude of a covalent bond, the system will decompose into subsystems—the constituent molecules. The smaller linkages will correspond to the intermolecular bonds.

众所周知，高能、高频振动与较小的物理子系统有关，而低频振动与由子系统组装而成的较大系统有关。例如，与分子振动相关的辐射频率远低于与原子行星电子振动相关的辐射频率；后者又低于与核过程相关的辐射频率。H 分子系统几乎是可分解的系统，其短期动态与分子系统的内部结构有关。 子系统以及这些子系统相互作用的长期动态。

It is well known that high-energy, high-frequency vibrations are associated with the smaller physical subsystems and low-frequency vibrations with the larger systems into which the subsystems are assembled. For example, the radiation frequencies associated with molecular vibrations are much lower than those associated with the vibrations of the planetary electrons of the atoms; the latter in turn are lower than those associated with nuclear processes.H Molecular systems are nearly decomposable systems, with the short-run dynamics relating to the internal structures of the subsystems and the long-run dynamics to the interactions of these subsystems.

13. 有关几类分子力和分子间力及其解离能的概述，请参阅 Setlow 和 Pollard 的《分子生物物理学》第 6 章。典型共价键的能量约为 80-100 k 卡/摩尔，氢键的能量约为 10k 卡/摩尔。离子键通常介于这两个水平之间；由范德华力形成的键的能量较低。

13. For a survey of the several classes of molecular and intermolecular forces, and their dissociation energies, see Setlow and Pollard, Molecular Biophysics, chapter 6. The energies of typical covalent bonds are of the order of 80-100 k cal/mole, of the hydrogen bonds, 10k cal/mole. Ionic bonds generally lie between these two levels; the bonds due to van der Waals forces are lower in energy.

14. 各种系统振动的典型波数（波数是波长的倒数，因此与频率成正比）：钢丝受拉—10"1° 至 10-' cm" 1

14. Typical wave numbers for vibrations associated with various systems (the wave number is the reciprocal of wave length, hence proportional to frequency): Steel wire under tension—10"1° to IO-' cm"1

分子旋转 - 10° 至 10 2 cm-1

Molecular rotations—10° to 102 cm"1

分子振动 - 10 2至 10' cm-1

Molecular vibrations—102 to 10' cm"1

行星电子—​​—10 4至 10 5 cm-1

Planetary electrons—104 to 105 cm"1

核旋转—10 9至 101°cm" 1

Nuclear rotations—109 to 101° cm"1

核表面振动 - 10 英寸至 10 12厘米“ 1

Nuclear surface vibrations—10" to 1012 cm"1

物理学中采用的许多重要近似的有效性取决于所研究系统的近似可分解性。例如，不可逆过程的热力学理论要求假设宏观不平衡但微观平衡，这正是我们在热交换示例中描述的情况。15类似地，量子力学中的计算通常通过将弱相互作用视为对强相互作用系统产生扰动来处理。

A number of the important approximations employed in physics depend for their validity on the near decomposability of the systems studied. The theory of the thermodynamics of irreversible processes, for example, requires the assumption of macroscopic disequilibrium but microscopic equilibrium, exactly the situation described in our heat-exchange example.15 Similarly computations in quantum mechanics are often handled by treating weak interactions as producing perturbations on a system of strong interactions.

关于层级跨度的一些观察

Some Observations on Hierarchic Span

要理解为什么层次结构跨度有时很宽（如晶体中）有时很窄，我们需要更详细地研究相互作用。一般来说，关键考虑因素是两个（或几个）子系统之间的相互作用在多大程度上排除了这些子系统与其他子系统的相互作用。让我们首先研究一些物理示例。

To understand why the span of hierarchies is sometimes very broad—as in crystals—and sometimes narrow, we need to examine more detail of the interactions. In general the critical consideration is the extent to which interaction between two (or a few) subsystems excludes interaction of these subsystems with the others. Let us examine first some physical examples.

考虑一种由相同分子组成的气体，每个分子都能以某种方式与其他分子形成共价键。假设我们可以为每个原子分配一个特定数量的键，这些键能够同时维持。（这个数字显然与我们通常所说的价数有关。）现在假设两个原子结合在一起，我们还可以为这个组合分配一个特定数量的外部键，这些外部键能够维持。如果这个数字与与单个原子相关的数字相同，那么键合过程可以无限期地进行下去——原子可以形成无限长的晶体或聚合物。如果复合材料能够形成的键数小于与每个部分相关的键数，那么聚集过程必然会停止。

Consider a gas of identical molecules, each of which can form covalent bonds in certain ways with others. Let us suppose that we can associate with each atom a specific number of bonds that it is capable of maintaining simultaneously. (This number is obviously related to the number we usually call its valence.) Now suppose that two atoms join and that we can also associate with the combination a specific number of external bonds it is capable of maintaining. If this number is the same as the number associated with the individual atoms, the bonding process can go on indefinitely—the atoms can form crystals or polymers of indefinite extent. If the number of bonds of which the composite is capable is less than the number associated with each of the parts, then the process of agglomeration must come to a halt.

我们只需举几个基本的例子。普通气体没有聚集的趋势，因为原子的多重键合“耗尽”了它们相互作用的能力。虽然每个氧原子的价数为 2，但 O 2分子的价数为 0。相反，不确定可以构建有限个单键碳原子链，因为任意数量的此类原子链，每个都有两个侧基，且价数恰好为二。

We need only mention some elementary examples. Ordinary gases show no tendency to agglomerate, because the multiple bonding of atoms "uses up" their capacity to interact. While each oxygen atom has a valence of two, the O2 molecules have a zero valence. Contrariwise, indefinite chains of single-bonded carbon atoms can be built up, because a chain of any number of such atoms, each with two side groups, has a valence of exactly two.

15.SRde Groot，不可逆过程热力学（纽约：Interscience Publishers，1951），第11-12页。

15. S. R. de Groot, Thermodynamics of Irreversible Processes (New York: Interscience Publishers, 1951), pp. 11-12.

现在，如果我们有一个元素系统，它既具有强相互作用能力，又具有弱相互作用能力，并且其强键通过组合可以耗尽，会发生什么？子系统将形成，直到所有强相互作用能力都用于其构建。然后，这些子系统将通过较弱的二级键连接成更大的系统。例如，水分子的价数基本上为零——所有潜在的共价键都被氢和氧分子的相互作用完全占据。但分子的几何形状会产生电偶极子，允许水和溶解在其中的盐之间发生弱相互作用——因此会出现诸如电解电导率之类的现象。16

Now what happens if we have a system of elements that possess both strong and weak interaction capacities and whose strong bonds are exhaustible through combination? Subsystems will form, until all the capacity for strong interaction is utilized in their construction. Then these subsystems will be linked by the weaker second-order bonds into larger systems. For example, a water molecule has essentially a valence of zero— all the potential covalent bonds are fully occupied by the interaction of hydrogen and oxygen molecules. But the geometry of the molecule creates an electric dipole that permits weak interaction between the water and salts dissolved in it—whence such phenomena as its electrolytic conductivity.16

同样，人们观察到，尽管电力比引​​力强得多，但对于天文尺度的系统来说，后者比前者重要得多。当然，解释是电力是双极的，在较小子系统的连接中全部“用尽”，而宏观尺寸的区域通常不会发现正电荷或负电荷的显著净平衡。

Similarly it has been observed that, although electrical forces are much stronger than gravitational forces, the latter are far more important than the former for systems on an astronomical scale. The explanation of course is that the electrical forces, being bipolar, are all "used up" in the linkages of the smaller subsystems and that significant net balances of positive or negative charges are not generally found in regions of macroscopic size.

在社会系统中，与物理系统一样，大量子系统同时交互通常存在限制。在社会情况下，这些限制与这样一个事实有关：人类更像是一个串行信息处理系统，而不是并行信息处理系统。他或她一次只能进行一次对话，虽然这并不限制大众传播可以针对的受众规模，但它确实限制了同时参与大多数其他形式社交互动的人数。除了直接互动的要求外，大多数角色都会施加耗时的任务和责任。例如，一个人不能与大量其他人扮演“朋友”的角色。

In social as in physical systems there are generally limits on the simultaneous interaction of large numbers of subsystems. In the social case these limits are related to the fact that a human being is more nearly a serial than a parallel information-processing system. He or she can carry on only one conversation at a time, and although this does not limit the size of the audience to which a mass communication can be addressed, it does limit the number of people simultaneously involved in most other forms of social interaction. Apart from requirements of direct interactions, most roles impose tasks and responsibilities that are time consuming. One cannot, for example, enact the role of "friend" with large numbers of other people.

在社会系统中，就像在物理系统中一样，高频动态与子系统相关，而低频动态与子系统相关。频率动态与较大的系统有关。例如，人们普遍认为，高管在组织层级中的位置越高，其相关规划范围就越长。高管之间互动的平均持续时间和互动之间的平均间隔在较高级别上比在较低级别上更长，这也可能是正确的。

It is probably true that in social as in physical systems the higher-frequency dynamics are associated with the subsystems and the lower-frequency dynamics with the larger systems. It is generally believed, for example, that the relevant planning horizon of executives is longer, the higher their location in the organizational hierarchy. It is probably also true that both the average duration of an interaction between executives and the average interval between interactions are greater at higher than lower levels.

16. 例如，请参阅 L. Pauling，《普通化学》（旧金山：WH Freeman，第 2 版，1953 年），第 15 章。

16. See, for example, L. Pauling, General Chemistry (San Francisco: W. H. Freeman, 2nd ed., 1953), chapter 15.

摘要：近似可分解性

Summary: Near Decomposability

我们已经看到，层次结构具有近乎可分解的特性。组件内的联系通常比组件间的联系更强。这一事实具有将层次结构的高频动态（涉及组件的内部结构）与低频动态（涉及组件之间的相互作用）分开的效果。接下来，我们将讨论这种分离对复杂系统的描述和理解的一些重要影响。

We have seen that hierarchies have the property of near decomposability. Intracomponent linkages are generally stronger than intercomponent linkages. This fact has the effect of separating the high-frequency dynamics of a hierarchy—involving the internal structure of the components— from the low-frequency dynamics—involving interaction among components. We shall turn next to some important consequences of this separation for the description and comprehension of complex systems.

重新审视生物进化

Biological Evolution Revisited

在研究了近可分解系统的特性之后，我们现在可以完成关于多细胞生物通过组织和器官特化而进化的讨论。器官执行一组特定的功能，每项功能通常都需要其组成部分之间不断相互作用（例如，一系列化学反应，每个步骤都需要使用特定的酶来执行）。它从生物体的其他部分提取原材料，并将产品输送到其他部分，但这些输入和输出过程仅在总体上取决于每个特定器官内发生的事情。就像经济市场中的商业公司一样，每个器官都可以在对其他器官活动细节一无所知的情况下履行其功能，而它通过消化系统、循环系统和排泄系统以及其他运输渠道与这些器官相连。

Having examined the properties of nearly-decomposable systems, we can now complete our discussion of the evolution of multi-cellular organisms through specialization of tissues and organs. An organ performs a specific set of functions, each usually requiring continual interaction among its component parts (a sequence of chemical reactions, say, each step employing a particular enzyme for its execution). It draws raw materials from other parts of the organism and delivers products to other parts, but these input and output processes depend only in an aggregate way on what is occurring within each specific organ. Like a business firm in an economic market, each organ can perform its functions in blissful ignorance of the detail of activity in other organs, with which it is connected by the digestive, circulatory, and excretory systems and other transport channels.

换个说法，器官内部的变化主要通过改变它们产生的输出量与它们需要的输入量之间的关系（即整体效率）来影响生物体的其他部分。因此，生物体几乎是可分解的：与同一级别的单元之间的相互作用相比，任何级别的单元内部的相互作用都是迅速而激烈的。 水平。循环系统或特殊组织中储存的各种物质会减缓和缓冲每个单位对其他单位的影响。在短期内，单个单位（例如单个器官）的运作几乎独立于其他单位的运作细节。

Expressing the matter slightly differently, changes within an organ affect the other parts of the organism mainly by changing the relation between the quantities of outputs they produce and the inputs they require (that is, their overall efficiency). Thus, biological organisms are nearly-decomposable: the interactions within units at any level are rapid and intense in comparison with the interactions between units at the same level. Inventories of various substances, held in the circulatory system or in special tissues, slow down and buffer effects of each unit on the others. In the short run, single units (e.g., single organs) operate nearly independently of the detail of operation of the other units.

在达尔文的自然选择框架内，无法单独评估单个组织或器官的适应性（效率）；适应性是通过整个生物体的后代数量来衡量的。进化就像一个复杂的实验，适应性是唯一的因变量，而单个基因的结构则是自变量。这个过程的目标是比较每个基因的替代形式（等位基因）对总体适应性的贡献——以及这些替代形式对一组基因的组合的贡献。

Within the Darwinian framework of natural selection there is no way in which the fitness (efficiency) of individual tissues or organs can be separately evaluated; fitness is measured by the number of offspring of the entire organism. Evolution is like a complex experiment, with fitness as the sole dependent variable, and the structures of the individual genes as independent variables. The goal of the process is to compare the contribution to total fitness of alternative forms (alleles) of each gene—and of combinations of these alternatives for sets of genes.

事实上，如果某个特定基因的适应性取决于它与其他所有基因的等位基因相结合，那么复杂生物体中涉及数万个基因的组合将是惊人的，而衡量某个特定等位基因对适应性的贡献的问题也将是压倒性的。r

If, in fact, the fitness of a particular gene depended on which alleles of all the other genes it was combined with, the combinatorics, involving tens of thousands of genes in complex organisms, would be staggering, and the problem of measuring the contribution of a particular allele to fitness would be overwhelming.r

有了近可分解性，我们可以假设，同一器官的两种不同设计的相对效率（例如，具有相同功能的两个不同基因序列）大致与生物体中存在哪些其他器官的变体无关。总体适应度本质上是各个器官几乎独立贡献的附加度量。本质上，我们获得了点击保险箱的优势：每个拨盘（控制一个器官过程的基因）的“正确”设置可以独立于其他拨盘的当前设置方式来确定。搜索的是器官的有效集合，而不是单个基因的有效集合。

With near-decomposability, we can assume that the relative efficiency of two different designs for the same organ (e.g., two different gene sequences with the same function) is approximately independent of which variants of other organs are present in the organism. The total fitness is essentially an additive measure of the nearly independent contributions of the individual organs. Essentially, we obtain the advantages of the clicking safe: the "correct" setting of each dial (the genes governing one organ's processes) can be determined independently of how the other dials are currently set. The search is for effective sets of organs instead of effective sets of individual genes.

如今，我们对基因组的结构有了足够的了解，可以合理地确定它有一个层次结构生物体中过程的层次结构与生物体控制结构映射得相当接近。18 当然，这只是对任何实际生物体整体情况的粗略简化。除了在特定器官中起作用的基因（由控制基因打开或关闭）外，还有一些基因决定了所有细胞中更普遍的代谢过程。但这些常见的细胞内过程处于层次结构的细胞级别，低于组织和器官级别，而且相应的基因可以被认为几乎独立于控制特定器官中专门过程的基因运行。”

Enough is known today about the architecture of the genome to be reasonably certain that it has a hierarchical control structure mapping reasonably closely to the hierarchy of processes in the organism.18 Of course, this is a gross simplification of the total picture in any actual organism. In addition to the genes that operate in particular organs (turned on and off by control genes), there are also the genes that determine the more general metabolic processes that are found within all the cells. But these common intra-cellular processes are at the cell level of the hierarchy, below the level of tissues and organs, and again the corresponding genes can be supposed to operate nearly independently of those that control specialized processes in specific organs."

17. 由于 N 个基因中每个基因只有两个等位基因，因此必须通过选择来评估 2* 种替代方案。用钟表匠的比喻来说，这相当于不间断地组装 2 N 个零件。对于一个拥有一千个基因的生物体来说，自然选择的变化将极其缓慢，即使在地质尺度上也是如此。

17. With only two alleles for each of N genes, 2* alternatives would have to be evaluated by selection. This is equivalent, in the watchmaker metaphor, to assembling 2N parts without interruption. For an organism with even a thousand genes, say, change by natural selection would be extremely slow, even on a geological scale.

18. F. Jacob和J. Monod，《蛋白质合成中的遗传调控机制》，《分子生物学》， 3（1961）：318-56。

18. F. Jacob and J. Monod, "Genetic Regulatory Mechanisms in the Synthesis of Proteins," Molecular Biology, 3(1961):318-56.

复杂性的描述

The Description of Complexity

如果你让一个人画一个复杂的物体——比如人的脸——他几乎总是会以层次化的方式进行。20首先，他会勾勒出脸部的轮廓。然后，他会添加或插入特征：眼睛、鼻子、嘴巴、耳朵、头发。如果要求他进一步细化，他会开始为每个特征（瞳孔、眼睑、眼睛的睫毛等）设计细节，直到达到他解剖学知识的极限。他关于物体的信息在记忆中是按层次排列的，就像一个主题轮廓。

If you ask a person to draw a complex object—such as a human face— he will almost always proceed in a hierarchic fashion.20 First he will outline the face. Then he will add or insert features: eyes, nose, mouth, ears, hair. If asked to elaborate, he will begin to develop details for each of the features—pupils, eyelids, lashes for the eyes, and so on—until he reaches the limits of his anatomical knowledge. His information about the object is arranged hierarchically in memory, like a topical outline.

当信息以大纲形式呈现时，很容易包含有关主要部分之间关系的信息以及有关每个子大纲中各部分内部关系的信息。有关属于不同部分的子部分之间关系的详细信息在大纲中没有位置，并且可能会丢失。此类信息的丢失和主要保留有关层次顺序的信息是区分儿童或未经表现训练的人的绘画与受过训练的艺术家的绘画的显著特征。（我说的是一位努力表现的艺术家。）

When information is put in outline form, it is easy to include information about the relations among the major parts and information about the internal relations of parts in each of the suboutlines. Detailed information about the relations of subparts belonging to different parts has no place in the outline and is likely to be lost. The loss of such information and the preservation mainly of information about hierarchic order is a salient characteristic that distinguishes the drawings of a child or someone untrained in representation from the drawing of a trained artist. (I am speaking of an artist who is striving for representation.)

19. 如何将此类层次结构引入第 7 章讨论的遗传算法中，以加快其学习或进化的速度，John H. Holland 在《自然和人工系统的适应性》（密歇根州安娜堡：密歇根大学出版社，1975 年）一书中进行了讨论。请特别参阅第 167-168 页和第 152-153 页。

19. How hierarchical architectures of these kinds can be introduced into the genetic algorithms discussed in chapter 7, in order to speed up their rates of learning or evolution, is discussed by John H. Holland in Adaptation in Natural and Artificial Systems (Ann Arbor, MI: The University of Michigan Press, 1975). See especially pp. 167-168 and 152-153.

20. 乔治·A·米勒收集了受试者的实验方案，这些受试者被要求画出人脸，并发现他们的行为方式与本文所述一致（私人通信）。另请参阅 EH Gombrich 的《艺术与幻觉》（纽约：万神殿出版社，1960 年），第 291-296 页。

20. George A. Miller has collected protocols from subjects who were given the task of drawing faces and finds that they behave in the manner described here (private communication). See also E. H. Gombrich, Art and Illusion (New York: Pantheon Books, 1960), pp. 291-296.

近似可分解性和可理解性

Near Decomposability and Comprehensibility

从我们对近可分解系统的动态特性的讨论中，我们已经看到，将它们表示为层次结构会相对减少信息丢失。属于不同部分的子部分仅以聚合方式相互作用——它们相互作用的细节可以忽略不计。在研究两个大分子的相互作用时，我们通常不需要详细考虑一个分子的原子核与另一个分子的原子核之间的相互作用。在研究两个国家之间的相互作用时，我们不需要详细研究第一个国家的每个公民与第二个国家的每个公民之间的相互作用。

From our discussion of the dynamic properties of nearly decomposable systems, we have seen that comparatively little information is lost by representing them as hierarchies. Subparts belonging to different parts only interact in an aggregative fashion—the detail of their interaction can be ignored. In studying the interaction of two large molecules, generally we do not need to consider in detail the interactions of nuclei of the atoms belonging to the one molecule with the nuclei of the atoms belonging to the other. In studying the interaction of two nations, we do not need to study in detail the interactions of each citizen of the first with each citizen of the second.

那么，许多复杂系统具有几乎可分解的层次结构这一事实是使我们能够理解、描述甚至“看到”此类系统及其各部分的主要促进因素。或者也许应该反过来说。如果世界上有一些重要的系统是复杂的，但没有层次结构，它们可能在很大程度上逃脱了我们的观察和理解。对它们行为的分析需要对其基本部分相互作用的详细了解和计算，这超出了我们的记忆或计算能力。21

The fact then that many complex systems have a nearly decomposable, hierarchic structure is a major facilitating factor enabling us to understand, describe, and even "see" such systems and their parts. Or perhaps the proposition should be put the other way round. If there are important systems in the world that are complex without being hierarchic, they may to a considerable extent escape our observation and understanding. Analysis of their behavior would involve such detailed knowledge and calculation of the interactions of their elementary parts that it would be beyond our capacities of memory or computation.21

21. 我认为，前面提到的WM Elsasser的《生物学的物理基础》的中心论点的谬误在于，他忽略了复杂系统描述的简化，而这种简化源于系统的层次结构。因此（第155页）：

21. I believe the fallacy in the central thesis of W. M. Elsasser's The Physical Foundation of Biology, mentioned earlier, lies in his ignoring the simplification in description of complex systems that derives from their hierarchic structure. Thus (p. 155):

如果我们现在将类似的论证应用于酶促反应与蛋白质分子基质的耦合，我们就会发现，在足够长的时间内，与这些分子的结构细节相对应的信息将传递到细胞的动力学中，传递到更高层次的组织中，并可能影响这种动力学。虽然这种推理只是定性的，但它使以下假设可信：在生物体中，与无机晶体不同，微观结构的影响不能简单地平均化；随着时间的推移，这种影响将渗透到细胞“所有层次”的行为中。

If we now apply similar arguments to the coupling of enzymatic reactions with the substratum of protein molecules, we see that over a sufficient period of time, the information corresponding to the structural details of these molecules will be communicated to the dynamics of the cell, to higher levels of organization as it were, and may influence such dynamics. While this reasoning is only qualitative, it lends credence to the assumption that in the living organism, unlike the inorganic crystal, the effects of microscopic structure cannot be simply averaged out; as time goes on this influence will pervade the behavior of the cell "at all levels."

但从我们对近分解性的讨论来看，微观结构中控制有机体动力学缓慢发展方面的那些方面似乎可以从控制更快的细胞代谢过程的方面中分离出来。因此，我们不应该对解开原因之网感到绝望。另见 JR Platt 在《生物学和医学展望》2（1959）：243-245 中对 Elsasser 的书的评论。

But from our discussion of near decomposability it would appear that those aspects of microstructure that control the slow developmental aspects of organismic dynamics can be separated out from the aspects that control the more rapid cellular metabolic processes. For this reason we should not despair of unraveling the web of causes. See also J. R. Platt's review of Elsasser's book in Perspectives in Biology and Medicine, 2(1959):243-245.

我不会试图解决先有鸡还是先有蛋的问题：我们之所以能够理解世界，是因为它是层级化的，还是因为世界没有层级化的方面我们无法理解和观察，所以它才显得层级化。我已经给出了一些理由，假设前者至少是事实的一半——进化的复杂性往往是层级化的——但这可能不是全部事实。

I shall not try to settle which is chicken and which is egg: whether we are able to understand the world because it is hierarchic or whether it appears hierarchic because those aspects of it which are not elude our understanding and observation. I have already given some reasons for supposing that the former is at least half the truth—that evolving complexity would tend to be hierarchic—but it may not be the whole truth.

复杂系统的简单描述

Simple Descriptions of Complex Systems

有人可能会认为t 的描述一个复杂的系统d 本身就是一个复杂的符号结构—事实上可能就是这样。但是没有保守要求法律s 描述尽可能繁琐描述的对象.一个简单的例子我将展示一个系统可以说是生态从理论上讲。假设该系统是一个二维类似 t 的扩展数组他的：

One might suppose that the description of a complex system would itself be a complex structure of symbols—and indeed it may be just that. But there is no conservation law that requires that the description be as cumbersome as the object described. A trivial example will show how a system can be described economically. Suppose the system is a two-dimensional array like this:

总体模式，用单个符号 a 来表示它是经济的。如果一个复杂结构完全没有冗余——如果其结构的任何方面都不能从任何其他方面推断出来——那么它就是它自己最简单的描述。我们可以展示它，但不能用更简单的结构来描述它。我们讨论的层次结构具有高度的冗余性，因此通常可以用经济的术语来描述。冗余有多种形式，我将提到其中三种：

the total pattern, it is economical to represent it by the single symbol, a. If a complex structure is completely unredundant—if no aspect of its structure can be inferred from any other—then it is its own simplest description. We can exhibit it, but we cannot describe it by a simpler structure. The hierarchic structures we have been discussing have a high degree of redundancy, hence can often be described in economical terms. The redundancy takes a number of forms, of which I shall mention three:

1. 层次系统通常仅由几种不同的子系统以各种组合和排列方式组成。一个常见的例子是蛋白质，它们的众多种类仅由二十种不同的氨基酸排列而成。同样，九十多种元素提供了无限多种分子所需的所有类型的构建块。因此，我们可以从与生成复杂系统的基本子系统的基本集合相对应的有限基本术语字母表中构建我们的描述。

1. Hierarchic systems are usually composed of only a few different kinds of subsystems in various combinations and arrangements. A familiar example is the proteins, their multitudinous variety arising from arrangements of only twenty different amino acids. Similarly the ninety-odd elements provide all the kinds of building blocks needed for an infinite variety of molecules. Hence we can construct our description from a restricted alphabet of elementary terms corresponding to the basic set of elementary subsystems from which the complex system is generated.

2. 我们已经看到，层次系统通常是近乎可分解的。因此，只有其各部分的聚合属性才能用于描述这些部分的相互作用。近乎可分解性概念的概括可以称为“空世界假说”——大多数事物与大多数其他事物之间的联系都很弱；对于可容忍的现实描述，只需要考虑所有可能相互作用中的一小部分。通过采用一种允许不提及某些事物缺失的描述性语言，可以非常简洁地描述一个近乎空的世界。哈伯德妈妈不必检查可能的内容清单就可以说她的橱柜是空的。

2. Hierarchic systems are, as we have seen, often nearly decomposable. Hence only aggregative properties of their parts enter into the description of the interactions of those parts. A generalization of the notion of near decomposability might be called the "empty world hypothesis"—most things are only weakly connected with most other things; for a tolerable description of reality only a tiny fraction of all possible interactions needs to be taken into account. By adopting a descriptive language that allows the absence of something to go unmentioned, a nearly empty world can be described quite concisely. Mother Hubbard did not have to check off the list of possible contents to say that her cupboard was bare.

3. 通过适当的“重新编码”，复杂系统结构中存在但不明显的冗余通常可以变得明显。动态系统描述的最常见退化是用产生该路径的微分定律的描述取代时间路径的描述。简单之处在于系统在任何给定时间的状态与系统在短时间内的状态之间存在恒定的关系。因此，序列 1357911 ... 的结构最简单的表达方式是观察每个成员都是通过将 2 加到前一个成员上而获得的。但这是伽利略发现的序列，用来描述球在倾斜平面上滚动的连续时间间隔结束时的速度。

3. By appropriate "recoding," the redundancy that is present but unobvious in the structure of a complex system can often be made patent. The commonest receding of descriptions of dynamic systems consists in replacing a description of the time path with a description of a differential law that generates that path. The simplicity resides in a constant relation between the state of the system at any given time and the state of the system a short time later. Thus the structure of the sequence 1357911 ... is most simply expressed by observing that each member is obtained by adding 2 to the previous one. But this is the sequence that Galileo found to describe the velocity at the end of successive time intervals of a ball rolling down an inclined plane.

一个众所周知的命题是，科学的任务是利用世界的冗余来简单地描述这个世界。在这里，我不会探讨一般的方法论观点，而是会仔细研究两种主要类型的描述，这两种描述似乎可供我们在寻求对复杂系统的理解时使用。我将它们分别称为状态描述和过程描述。

It is a familiar proposition that the task of science is to make use of the world's redundancy to describe that world simply. I shall not pursue the general methodological point here, but I shall instead take a closer look at two main types of description that seem to be available to us in seeking an understanding of complex systems. I shall call these state description and process description, respectively.

状态描述和过程描述

State Descriptions and Process Descriptions

“圆是与给定点等距的所有点的轨迹。”“要构造一个圆，请旋转一个圆规，其中一只臂固定，直到另一只臂回到其起点。”欧几里得隐含地指出，如果您执行第二句中指定的过程，您将产生一个满足第一句定义的对象。第一句是圆的状态描述；第二句是过程描述。

"A circle is the locus of all points equidistant from a given point." "To construct a circle, rotate a compass with one arm fixed until the other arm has returned to its starting point." It is implicit in Euclid that if you carry out the process specified in the second sentence, you will produce an object that satisfies the definition of the first. The first sentence is a state description of a circle; the second, a process description.

这两种理解结构的模式是我们经验的经纬。图片、蓝图、大多数图表和化学结构式都是状态描述。配方、微分方程和化学反应方程是过程描述。前者将世界描述为感知的；它们提供了识别对象的标准，通常是通过对对象本身进行建模。后者将世界描述为作用的；它们提供了生产或生成具有所需特征的对象的手段。

These two modes of apprehending structures are the warp and weft of our experience. Pictures, blueprints, most diagrams, and chemical structural formulas are state descriptions. Recipes, differential equations, and equations for chemical reactions are process descriptions. The former characterize the world as sensed; they provide the criteria for identifying objects, often by modeling the objects themselves. The latter characterize the world as acted upon; they provide the means for producing or generating objects having the desired characteristics.

感知世界与行动世界之间的区别定义了适应性有机体生存的基本条件。有机体必须在感知世界的目标与过程世界中的行动之间建立关联。当它们被意识到并被言语化时，这些关联就对应于我们通常所说的手段-目的分析。给定一个期望状态和一个现有状态，适应性有机体的任务是找到这两种状态之间的差异，然后找到消除差异的相关过程。22

The distinction between the world as sensed and the world as acted upon defines the basic condition for the survival of adaptive organisms. The organism must develop correlations between goals in the sensed world and actions in the world of process. When they are made conscious and verbalized, these correlations correspond to what we usually call means-ends analysis. Given a desired state of affairs and an existing state of affairs, the task of an adaptive organism is to find the difference between these two states and then to find the correlating process that will erase the difference.22

因此，解决问题需要不断地在同一个复杂现实的状态和过程描述之间进行转换。柏拉图在《美诺篇》中说： 认为所有学习都是记忆。除非我们已经知道答案，否则他无法解释我们如何发现或识别问题的答案。2 1我们与世界的双重关系是悖论的根源和解决方案。我们通过给出解决方案的状态描述来提出问题。任务是发现从初始状态产生目标状态的一系列过程。从过程描述到状态描述的转换使我们能够识别我们何时成功。这个解决方案对我们来说确实是新的——我们不需要柏拉图的记忆理论来解释我们如何识别它。

Thus problem solving requires continual translation between the state and process descriptions of the same complex reality. Plato, in the Meno, argued that all learning is remembering. He could not otherwise explain how we can discover or recognize the answer to a problem unless we already know the answer.21 Our dual relation to the world is the source and solution of the paradox. We pose a problem by giving the state description of the solution. The task is to discover a sequence of processes that will produce the goal state from an initial state. Translation from the process description to the state description enables us to recognize when we have succeeded. The solution is genuinely new to us—and we do not need Plato's theory of remembering to explain how we recognize it.

22. 参见 HA Simon 和 A. Newell，《人类思维的模拟》，载 M. Greenberger 主编，《管理与未来的计算机》（纽约：Wiley，1962 年），第 95-114 页，特别是第 110 页及后续页。

22. See H. A. Simon and A. Newell, "Simulation of Human Thinking," in M. Greenberger (ed.), Management and the Computer of the Future (New York: Wiley, 1962), pp. 95-114, esp. pp. 110 ff.

现在有越来越多的证据表明，人类解决问题这一活动基本上是一种手段-目的分析，旨在发现通往期望目标的路径的过程描述。一般范式是：给定蓝图，找到相应的配方。科学活动的大部分都是该范式的应用：给定一些自然现象的描述，找到产生该现象的过程的微分方程。

There is now a growing body of evidence that the activity called human problem solving is basically a form of means-ends analysis that aims at discovering a process description of the path that leads to a desired goal. The general paradigm is: Given a blueprint, to find the corresponding recipe. Much of the activity of science is an application of that paradigm: Given the description of some natural phenomena, to find the differential equations for processes that will produce the phenomena.

自复制系统的复杂性描述

The Description of Complexity in Self-Reproducing Systems

为复杂系统寻找相对简单的描述这一问题不仅对理解人类对世界的认识有意义，而且对解释复杂系统如何自我复制也有意义。在讨论复杂系统的演化时，我只是简要地谈到了自我复制的作用。

The problem of finding relatively simple descriptions for complex systems is of interest not only for an understanding of human knowledge of the world but also for an explanation of how a complex system can reproduce itself. In my discussion of the evolution of complex systems, I touched only briefly on the role of self-reproduction.

高原子量的原子和复杂的无机分子见证了复杂性的演化并不意味着自我复制。如果从简单演化为复杂性的可能性足够大，它就会反复发生；系统的统计平衡将发现大部分基本粒子参与复杂系统。

Atoms of high atomic weight and complex inorganic molecules are witnesses to the fact that the evolution of complexity does not imply self-reproduction. If evolution of complexity from simplicity is sufficiently probable, it will occur repeatedly; the statistical equilibrium of the system will find a large fraction of the elementary particles participating in complex systems.

然而，如果某种复合形式的存在增加了另一种类似形式的产生概率，那么复合物和成分之间的平衡可能会大大改变，有利于前者。如果我们对一个物体的描述足够清晰 并且完整，我们可以根据描述再现物体。无论再现的具体机制是什么，描述都为我们提供了必要的信息。

If, however, the existence of a particular complex form increased the probability of the creation of another form just like it, the equilibrium between complexes and components could be greatly altered in favor of the former. If we have a description of an object that is sufficiently clear and complete, we can reproduce the object from the description. Whatever the exact mechanism of reproduction, the description provides us with the necessary information.

23. 《柏拉图文集》， B. Jowett 译（纽约：戴尔出版社，1936 年），第 3 卷，第 26-35 页。参见 HA Simon，《布雷迪论波拉尼关于美诺悖论》，《科学哲学》，43（1976 年）：147-150。

23. The Works of Plato, B. Jowett, translator (New York: Dial Press, 1936), vol. 3, pp. 26-35. See H. A. Simon, "Bradie on Polanyi on the Meno Paradox," Philosophy of Science, 43(1976):147-150.

现在我们已经看到，复杂系统的描述可以有多种形式。具体来说，我们可以有状态描述，也可以有过程描述——蓝图或配方。生殖过程可以围绕这些信息源中的任何一个来构建。也许最简单的可能性是让复杂系统作为自身的描述——一个可以形成副本的模板。例如，目前最合理的理论之一，即脱氧核糖核酸 (DNA) 的繁殖理论认为，DNA 分子以匹配部分的双螺旋形式存在（每个部分本质上是另一个部分的“负片”），解开后，螺旋的每一半都可以作为模板，新的匹配部分可以在此模板上形成。

Now we have seen that the descriptions of complex systems can take many forms. In particular we can have state descriptions, or we can have process descriptions—blueprints or recipes. Reproductive processes could be built around either of these sources of information. Perhaps the simplest possibility is for the complex system to serve as a description of itself—a template on which a copy can be formed. One of the most plausible current theories, for example, of the reproduction of deoxyribonucleic acid (DNA) proposes that a DNA molecule, in the form of a double helix of matching parts (each essentially a "negative" of the other), unwinds to allow each half of the helix to serve as a template on which a new matching half can form.

另一方面，我们目前对 DNA 如何控制生物体新陈代谢的了解表明，通过模板进行繁殖只是所涉及的过程之一。根据流行的理论，DNA 既是其自身的模板，也是相关物质核糖核酸 (RNA) 的模板。RNA 反过来又是蛋白质的模板。但根据目前的知识，蛋白质不是通过模板方法指导生物体的新陈代谢，而是通过充当催化剂来控制细胞中的反应速率。RNA 是蛋白质的蓝图，而蛋白质是新陈代谢的配方。24

On the other hand, our current knowledge of how DNA controls the metabolism of the organism suggests that reproduction by template is only one of the processes involved. According to the prevailing theory, DNA serves as a template both for itself and for the related substance ribonucleic acid (RNA). RNA in turn serves as a template for protein. But proteins—according to current knowledge—guide the organism's metabolism not by the template method but by serving as catalysts to govern reaction rates in the cell. While RNA is a blueprint for protein, protein is a recipe for metabolism.24

个体发育重演系统发育

Ontogeny Recapitulates Phylogeny

生物体染色体中的 DNA 包含一些（或许是大部分）决定其发育和活动所需的信息。我们已经看到，如果当前的理论甚至大致正确，信息不是作为生物体的状态描述记录下来的，而是作为一系列“指令”记录下来的，用于从营养物质中构建和维持生物体。我已经使用了 食谱的隐喻；我同样可以将其与计算机程序进行比较，后者也是控制符号结构构造的一系列指令。让我来阐述一下后者比较的一些后果。

The DNA in the chromosomes of an organism contains some, and perhaps most, of the information that is needed to determine its development and activity. We have seen that, if current theories are even approximately correct, the information is recorded not as a state description of the organism but as a series of "instructions" for the construction and maintenance of the organism from nutrient materials. I have already used the metaphor of a recipe; I could equally well compare it with a computer program, which is also a sequence of instructions governing the construction of symbolic structures. Let me spin out some of the consequences of the latter comparison.

24. CB Anfinsen 的《进化的分子基础》（纽约：Wiley，1959 年）第 3 章和第 10 章将限定这一粗略、过于简单化的描述。有关可能控制分子结构的一些过程描述机制的富有想象力的讨论，请参阅 HH Pattee 的《论大分子序列的起源》，《生物物理学杂志》， 1（1961 年）：683-710。

24. C. B. Anfinsen, The Molecular Basis of Evolution (New York: Wiley, 1959), chapters 3 and 10, will qualify this sketchy, oversimplified account. For an imaginative discussion of some mechanisms of process description that could govern molecular structure, see H. H. Pattee, "On the Origin of Macromolecular Sequences," Biophysical Journal, 1(1961):683-710.

如果遗传物质是一种程序——从它与有机体的关系来看——那么它就是一种具有特殊属性的程序。首先，它是一个自我复制的程序；我们已经考虑过它可能的复制机制。其次，它是一个由达尔文进化论发展起来的程序。根据我们的钟表匠的论证，我们可以断言，它的许多祖先也是可行的程序——子组件的程序。

If genetic material is a program—viewed in its relation to the organism—it is a program with special and peculiar properties. First, it is a self-reproducing program; we have already considered its possible copying mechanism. Second, it is a program that has developed by Darwinian evolution. On the basis of our watchmaker's argument, we may assert that many of its ancestors were also viable programs—programs for the subassemblies.

关于这个程序的结构，我们还能做出其他推测吗？生物学中有一个著名的概括，它用词非常简洁，即使事实不支持，我们也不愿意放弃它：个体发育重演系统发育。个体生物在其发育过程中会经历一些类似于其祖先形式的阶段。人类胚胎会发育出鳃条，然后将其修改为其他用途，这是属于这一概括的一个常见特点。当今的生物学家喜欢强调这一原则的限定条件——个体发育只重演系统发育的最粗略方面，而且这些只是粗略的。这些限定条件不应使我们忽视这一事实，即该概括确实大致成立——它确实总结了一组关于生物发育的非常重要的事实。我们如何解释这些事实？

Are there any other conjectures we can make about the structure of this program? There is a well-known generalization in biology that is verbally so neat that we would be reluctant to give it up even if the facts did not support it: ontogeny recapitulates phylogeny. The individual organism in its development goes through stages that resemble some of its ancestral forms. The fact that the human embryo develops gill bars and then modifies them for other purposes is a familiar particular belonging to the generalization. Biologists today like to emphasize the qualifications of the principle—that ontogeny recapitulates only the grossest aspects of phylogeny, and these only crudely. These qualifications should not make us lose sight of the fact that the generalization does hold in rough approximation—it does summarize a very significant set of facts about the organism's development. How can we interpret these facts?

解决复杂问题的一种方法是将其简化为以前解决过的问题——展示从以前的解决方案到新问题的解决方案的步骤。如果在世纪之交，我们想指导工人制造汽车，也许最简单的方法就是告诉他如何通过移除单轴并添加发动机和变速器来改装马车。同样，遗传程序可以在进化过程中通过添加新的过程来改变，这些过程会将较简单的形式修改为更复杂的形式——构建一个原肠胚，取出一个囊胚并对其进行改造！

One way to solve a complex problem is to reduce it to a problem previously solved—to show what steps lead from the earlier solution to a solution of the new problem. If around the turn of the century we wanted to instruct a workman to make an automobile, perhaps the simplest way would have been to tell him how to modify a wagon by removing the singletree and adding a motor and transmission. Similarly a genetic program could be altered in the course of evolution by adding new processes that would modify a simpler form into a more complex one—to construct a gastrula, take a blastula and alter it!

因此，单细胞的遗传描述可能与将细胞组装成多细胞生物的遗传描述完全不同。通过细胞分裂进行繁殖需要 至少有一个状态描述（比如 DNA），以及一个简单的“解释过程”（用计算机语言中的术语来说），该过程复制此描述作为细胞分裂的更大复制过程的一部分。但这种机制显然不足以分化发育中的细胞。将该机制概念化为基于过程描述和稍微复杂一些的解释过程似乎更自然，该过程通过一系列阶段产生成年生物体，每个新的发育阶段都代表操作者对前一个阶段的影响。

The genetic description of a single cell may therefore take a quite different form from the genetic description that assembles cells into a multicelled organism. Multiplication by cell division would require as a minimum a state description (the DNA, say), and a simple "interpretive process"—to use the term from computer language—that copies this description as a part of the larger copying process of cell division. But such a mechanism clearly would not suffice for the differentiation of cells in development. It appears more natural to conceptualize that mechanism as based on a process description and a somewhat more complex interpretive process that produces the adult organism in a sequence of stages, each new stage in development representing the effect of an operator upon the previous one.

概念化这两种描述之间的相互关系比较困难。它们一定是相互关联的，因为我们已经对基因-酶机制有了足够多的了解，表明它们在发育和细胞代谢中都发挥着重要作用。我们从之前的讨论中获得的唯一线索是，描述本身在结构上可能是分层的，或几乎可分解的，较低层次控制单个细胞的快速、“高频”动态，较高层次的相互作用控制正在发育的多细胞生物的缓慢、“低频”动态。

It is harder to conceptualize the interrelation of these two descriptions. Interrelated they must be, for enough has been learned of gene-enzyme mechanisms to show that these play a major role in development as in cell metabolism. The single clue we obtain from our earlier discussion is that the description may itself be hierarchical, or nearly decomposable, in structure, the lower levels governing the fast, "high-frequency" dynamics of the individual cell and the higher-level interactions governing the slow, "low-frequency" dynamics of the developing multicellular organism.

越来越多的证据表明，遗传程序就是这样组织的。25 只要我们能够区分控制细胞代谢的遗传信息和控制多细胞组织中分化细胞发育的遗传信息，我们就大大简化了——正如我们已经看到的——我们的 理论描述的任务。但我可能已经把这个推测推得足够远了。

There is a rapidly growing body of evidence that the genetic program is organized in this way.25 To the extent that we can differentiate the genetic information that governs cell metabolism from the genetic information that governs the development of differentiated cells in the multicellular organization, we simplify enormously—as we have already seen—our task of theoretical description. But I have perhaps pressed this speculation far enough.

25. 有关这些问题的广泛讨论，请参阅 JD Watson，同上，特别是第 8 章和第 14 章。有关一些早期证据的综述，请参阅 PE Hartman 的《转导：比较综述》，收录于 WD McElroy 和 B. Glass (eds.)《遗传的化学基础》（巴尔的摩：约翰霍普金斯出版社，1957 年），第 442-454 页。JG Gall 的《染色体分化》讨论了基因在不同组织和不同发育阶段的不同活性的证据，收录于 WD McElroy 和 B. Glass (eds.) 《发育的化学基础》（巴尔的摩：约翰霍普金斯出版社，1958 年），第 103-135 页。最后，JR Platt 独立地、更全面地概述了一个与本文提出的模型非常相似的模型，《细胞和组织中遗传信息转移的‘书籍模型’》，载于 M. Kasha 和 B. Pullman (eds.)，《生物化学视野》（纽约：Academic Press，1962 年），第 167-187 页。当然，这种机制并不是唯一一种可以通过过程描述来控制发育的机制。诱导，以 Spemann 的组织者理论设想的形式，基于过程描述，其中已形成的组织中的代谢物控制着下一阶段的发育。

25. For extensive discussion of these matters, see J. D. Watson, op. cit., especially chapters 8 and 14. For a review of some of the early evidence, see P. E. Hartman, "Transduction: A Comparative Review," in W. D. McElroy and B. Glass (eds.), The Chemical Basis of Heredity (Baltimore: Johns Hopkins Press, 1957), pp. 442-454. Evidence for differential activity of genes in different tissues and at different stages of development is discussed by J. G. Gall, "Chromosomal Differentiation," in W. D. McElroy and B. Glass (eds.), The Chemical Basis of Development (Baltimore: Johns Hopkins Press, 1958), pp. 103-135. Finally, a model very like that proposed here has been independently, and far more fully, outlined by J. R. Platt, "A 'Book Model' of Genetic Information Transfer in Cells and Tissues," in M. Kasha and B. Pullman (eds.), Horizons in Biochemistry (New York: Academic Press, 1962), pp. 167-187. Of course this kind of mechanism is not the only one in which development could be controlled by a process description. Induction, in the form envisaged in Spemann's organizer theory, is based on a process description in which metabolites in already formed tissue control the next stages of development.

我们可能期望个体发生部分地重演进化系统中的系统发生，而进化系统的描述存储在过程语言中，这种概括在生物学领域之外也有应用。例如，它可以很容易地应用于教育过程中的知识传递。在大多数学科中，特别是在快速发展的科学中，从初级课程到高级课程的进步在很大程度上是科学本身概念史的进步。幸运的是，重演很少是字面意义上的——就像在生物学中一样。我们在化学中教授燃素理论并不是为了以后纠正它。（我不确定我是否能在其他学科中举出我们这样做的例子。）但是，让我们摆脱过去积累的课程修订并不常见，而且很痛苦。它们也并不总是可取的——在许多情况下，部分重演可能是获得高级知识的最快捷途径。

The generalization that we might expect ontogeny partially to recapitulate phylogeny in evolving systems whose descriptions are stored in a process language has applications outside the realm of biology. It can be applied as readily, for example, to the transmission of knowledge in the educational process. In most subjects, particularly in the rapidly advancing sciences, the progress from elementary to advanced courses is to a considerable extent a progress through the conceptual history of the science itself. Fortunately the recapitulation is seldom literal—any more than it is in the biological case. We do not teach the phlogiston theory in chemistry in order later to correct it. (I am not sure I could not cite examples in other subjects where we do exactly that.) But curriculum revisions that rid us of the accumulations of the past are infrequent and painful. Nor are they always desirable—partial recapitulation may, in many instances, provide the most expeditious route to advanced knowledge.

摘要：复杂性的描述

Summary: The Description of Complexity

结构是复杂还是简单，主要取决于我们描述它的方式。世界上发现的大多数复杂结构都具有极大的冗余性，我们可以利用这种冗余性来简化它们的描述。但要使用它，实现简化，我们必须找到正确的表示方法。

How complex or simple a structure is depends critically upon the way in which we describe it. Most of the complex structures found in the world are enormously redundant, and we can use this redundancy to simplify their description. But to use it, to achieve the simplification, we must find the right representation.

用过程描述取代自然状态描述这一概念在现代科学的发展中发挥了核心作用。以微分或差分方程组形式表达的动态定律在很多情况下为复杂事物的简单描述提供了线索。在前面的段落中，我试图表明科学探究的这一特点并非偶然或肤浅。状态描述和过程描述之间的相关性是任何适应性有机体运作的基础，也是其有目的地作用于其环境的能力的基础。我们目前对遗传机制的理解表明，即使在描述自身时，多细胞有机体也会发现过程描述（一种遗传编码程序）是简洁而有用的表示。

The notion of substituting a process description for a state description of nature has played a central role in the development of modern science. Dynamic laws, expressed in the form of systems of differential or difference equations, have in a large number of cases provided the clue for the simple description of the complex. In the preceding paragraphs I have tried to show that this characteristic of scientific inquiry is not accidental or superficial. The correlation between state description and process description is basic to the functioning of any adaptive organism, to its capacity for acting purposefully upon its environment. Our present-day understanding of genetic mechanisms suggests that even in describing itself the multicellular organism finds a process description—a genetically encoded program—to be the parsimonious and useful representation.

结论

Conclusion

我们的推测已经带我们涉猎了一系列令人震惊的话题，但如果我们希望寻找多种复杂系统的共同特性，这就是我们必须付出的代价。我的论点是，构建复杂系统非平凡理论的一条途径是通过层次理论。从经验上看，我们在自然界观察到的大部分复杂系统都表现出层次结构。从理论上讲，我们可以预期复杂系统是层次结构，因为复杂性必须从简单性发展而来。在它们的动态中，层次结构具有一种属性，即近可分解性，这大大简化了它们的行为。近可分解性还简化了复杂系统的描述，并使人们更容易理解如何以合理的范围存储系统开发或复制所需的信息。

Our speculations have carried us over a rather alarming array of topics, but that is the price we must pay if we wish to seek properties common to many sorts of complex systems. My thesis has been that one path to the construction of a nontrivial theory of complex systems is by way of a theory of hierarchy. Empirically a large proportion of the complex systems we observe in nature exhibit hierarchic structure. On theoretical grounds we could expect complex systems to be hierarchies in a world in which complexity had to evolve from simplicity. In their dynamics hierarchies have a property, near decomposability, that greatly simplifies their behavior. Near decomposability also simplifies the description of a complex system and makes it easier to understand how the information needed for the development or reproduction of the system can be stored in reasonable compass.

在科学和发动机领域研究“系统”是一个越来越受欢迎的活动。它的流行ty 更像是一种回应迫切需要或合成和分析复杂性汉是任何大开发一个bo知识和技能交易技巧复杂度。如果他的受欢迎程度不仅仅是一种时尚，必要性必须母亲发明和提供物质和名字一起去。电子探索评论ed 代表一个特定方向寻找这样的实质。

In science and engineering the study of "systems" is an increasingly popular activity. Its popularity is more a response to a pressing need for synthesizing and analyzing complexity than it is to any large development of a body of knowledge and technique for dealing with complexity. If this popularity is to be more than a fad, necessity will have to mother invention and provide substance to go with the name. The explorations reviewed here represent one particular direction of search for such substance.
